Package Lab

Class Main

java.lang.Object
Lab.Main
public class Main extends Object
Name: Saul Ouellet Date: January 25th 2022 Description: This project implements a Main class with various methods to print and manipulate 1D and 2D Arrays. I've implemented most of them so that the prints are in the methods themselves for clean readability.

    • compareArray

      public static boolean compareArray(int[] a, int[] b)
      function compares 2 1D int arrays with one another, will indicate if arrays are compatible or not.
      Parameters:
      a - supplies first int 1D array to function
      b - supplies second int 1D array to function
      Returns:
      return is boolean (true or false) -- automatically false if not compatible

    • compareArray2

      public static boolean compareArray2(int[][] a, int[][] b)
      function compares 2 2D int arrays with one another, will indicate if they're compatible or not.
      Parameters:
      a - supplies first int 2D array to function
      b - supplies second int 2D array to function
      Returns:
      returns boolean (true or false) -- automatically false if not compatible

    • multMat

      public static int[][] multMat(int[][] a, int[][] b)
      function checks if two matrices can multiply, then does so if possible using nested for loops -- else it says why it failed and returns null
      Parameters:
      a - supplies first int 2D array to function
      b - supplies second int 2D array to function
      Returns:
      returns the result, which is an int 2D array
